title: Mother goose treasury. - Volume 1.
brief_description: Eighteen Mother Goose nursery rhyme favourites: Old King Cole, Jack Be Nimble, Mary had a Little Lamb, Humpty Dumpty, Twinkle Twinkle, London Bridge and Simple Simon.
